about.details:
Founded in 2013, Nisus Finance Services Co Limited offers financial services such as Transaction Advisory Services, Fund and Asset Management, Private Equity and Venture Debt and Capital Solutions to Corporate Clients.

Nisus Finance Services has two business segments:

1. Transaction Advisory Services: assist and support the partners in transactions such as outright sales, joint ventures, joint development, capital structuring etc. The company helps businesses connect with private equity funds, risk capital providers, and financial institutions to support their growth. The company also offer advice on corporate real estate matters, helping to structure and finalize transactions efficiently.

2. Fund and Asset Management: includes providing growth capital, project financing, or special situation funding to developers, and asset management for Alternative Investment Funds focused on the real estate and infrastructure sector. As of date, we manage four schemes under the subsidiaries, step-down subsidiaries, and associate companies through SEBI, IFSC, and DIFC-registered AIFs, which include:

  1. Real Estate Special Opportunities Fund – 1
  2. Real Estate Credit Opportunities Fund – 1
  3. Nisus High Yield Growth Fund – 1
  4. Nisus High Yield Growth Fund Closed-Ended

The company's main sources of revenue are fund management fees earned by the fund manager/advisor entities for managing AIF fund pools.

Assets Under Management (AUM): Approximately Rs 1,000 crore (FY2024) across real estate and urban infrastructure.

Office Network: Three offices, including two in India and one international, as of January 31, 2024.

Competitve Strengths:

  • A well-established, credible and customer-focused NiFCO brand.
  • Diversified Business Model.
  • Ability to identify emerging market trends on time.
  • Strong Management and distinctive people and culture.
  • Prudent governance, risk management, and internal control frameworks.

As of January 31, 2024, the company employed 24 people in the Nisus Group (NiFCO).

faqs.question: What is the Nisus Finance Services IPO?
faqs.answer:
Nisus Finance Services IPO is a SME IPO of 6346400 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹114.24 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹180 per share. The minimum order quantity is 800.

The IPO opens on December 4, 2024, and closes on December 6, 2024.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Nisus Finance Services IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Nisus Finance Services IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Nisus Finance Services IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Nisus Finance Services IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Nisus Finance Services IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Nisus Finance Services IPO?
faqs.answer: Nisus Finance Services IPO lot size is 800, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,44,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Nisus Finance Services IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Nisus Finance Services IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Nisus Finance Services IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Nisus Finance Services IPO will be done on Monday, December 9, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, December 10, 2024. Check the Nisus Finance Services IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Nisus Finance Services IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Nisus Finance Services IPO listing date is on Wednesday, December 11, 2024.
